author: Nigel Slater
method: Scoop the avocado flesh into a mixing bowl. Squeeze the lime juice over the avocado to prevent it from discolouring. Lightly crush the avocado with a fork. Skin and roughly chop the chorizo. Roughly chop the chives and then fold everything together with the avocado and serve.
ingredients: 1 ripe avocado,  1 lime, juice only,  3 tbsp roughly chopped chives,  150g/5Â½oz cooked chorizo sausage, roughly chopped
